author: nascent nascentt
comment: Use it for the notifications. Very useful. The app is gorgeous, but main use case is for the notifications.  Which are mostly great.  The Weather Alert notification is a bit annoying though, as it always states Bright Weather as the notification (which is the app name) but it doesn't display the alert reason.... so it just reads as WEATHER ALERT: BRIGHT WEATHER. The other notifications are more informative, would be great if you can summarise the weather alert to fit in the notification title too.
title: Autoplaying Video Adverts!!!

author: Francisco Torres
comment: It seems to take a while to refresh. I usually turn off my phone and when I turn it back on the next day the weather stays on the day prior. It's like that for both my nexus 5 and 10. It doesn't correct itself on its own like other apps. Is there something going on that I can correct other than manually refreshing it? At times even a manual refresh doesn't work. Thanks for your time.
title: Updating?

author: Andrew Mischuk
comment: I downloaded it for the widget but the actual app is clean and classy.  I would however like a clear indication of where I am on the graph at the moment as it shows a 24 hour period and it doesn't seem I am at the same spot all the time.  It looks nice but it needs to be more clear. It has also been freezing up on me lately but not too often.  Also it is seems a bit slow to update.
title: Nice

author: Jeff Hildrop
comment: I have a few weather apps on my phone and Bright Weather is absolutely my favourite.  I don't know where Bright Weather gets its data from but the forecasts are always more accurate then the other apps I use, and accuracy is what its all about in my opinion. Add  to that a great user experience and I give this app 5 stars.  One thing I would like is to get a more detailed description for today's weather without being redirected to a website, would prefer it was embedded within the app.

author: Martin Kels
comment: The app looks great altogether and the weather display is precise and accurate. It is a pity though that German umlaut signs cannot be displayed correctly, these weather texts will bring up cryptic signs which are impossible to read. Unfortunately bright weather does not offer any language options. I hope that there will be a fix for these problems which I would gladly honour with five stars. 😊
title: Beautiful but buggy

author: Justin Verdejo
comment: I love the look of this,  clean,  clear and has a good widget.  However I do have some problems with updating (it doesn't sometimes and I need to force quit and restart) and I've noticed that the weather prediction itself can sometimes be incorrect but I believe this not to be the fault of the app.
title: Good but

author: Daniel Moyle
comment: Loved this app until my locations have suddenly become insanely inaccurate and vague (app doesn't display weather by suburb like it used to, only the city). Have reinstalled the app and have changed location settings. No difference. Other apps have no issues with location. Any help would be great.
title: Was great

comment: Why nothing works anymore? Location is super inaccurate like a 40min drive away from current location so useless. And I can't even add cities properly, if I add for example Montreal Canada it will find it but then add some small town which is an hour away or so. Same for most other places. Used to be good, now it became garbage.

author: Katie Sellers
comment: I loved this app because it was minimalistic and beautiful. The past couple weeks the weather has been a mess, and my app is telling me it's over 120 degrees Fahrenheit every day. Which, by the way, is like 50 degrees off. I didn't change any settings, and customer service basically told me it sucked to be me because they can't fix it and someone else has to. Makes me sad, but I think I'm going to have to let go of the app until it starts working again.
title: Used to love this app

author: Zaki Salah
comment: A problem however. I would like to suggest an idea. But my email address isn't valid? I've used to of my email addresses and they're  both working just fine. However the system denies that they're valid. A fix perhaps?
title: Loved it.

comment: It's a shame you've let this app die. The three little dots at the bottom of the screen are not centered, which I cannot unsee. Wallpapers only sometimes correspond to the Bing image on page 3. I also don't like this app's background process. I know it's only ~10MB and I can block it in my Android settings, but it doesn't do anything for me and otherwise always runs. I have the weather set to manually update, no widget in use, and notifications off, so there should be no reason for this. S'il vous plaît, ne laissez pas mourir cette appli! Elle serait la meilleure appli météo avec un peu de soin. Merci de votre travail jusque-là.

author: Babar Waheed
comment: Too many full screen ads. No easy way to switch between cities such as swiping right or left. Weather area is too light. Averages are nice, but cannot see monthly averages.
title: Ok, but lacks some things

author: Khaony Huon
comment: Can judge about the accuracy as I don't have any reference but so far, it the only app that's simple to use and great visually. I love the simple UI.
title: Great visual weather app

author: Herman Muker
comment: But sometimes the Time on the main 4×2 widget gets stuck and requires to be reset. Other than that it's a beautiful widget. Love the way it changes background every day. Good work.
title: It's Good

author: Ellen S
comment: Temperature notification in status bar is way too small, I don't need glasses but even I struggle to read sometimes. Using Wunderground instead which uses a much larger font, even though I prefer the rest of this app, need to use Wunderground for the notification.

author: Miroslav Mirić
comment: App is great, weather is very accurate in my location, but it's crashing every time I try to go to settings since day one on 5.1.1. Please fix it.
title: Crashing in settings

author: Dave Tanquary
comment: Also the daily forecast summary is wildly inaccurate. This morning it said it would be 71degrees F today, and there is snow on the ground.....
title: Very obtrusive ads

author: Andrey Peychev
comment: The video ads are too much for me. I'd rather use the stock app in my phone than deal with this whenever I want to check the weather
title: Not appropriate

author: John LJ
comment: I have had this App for a couple of yrs thru S6 & S7 and now, can't refresh weather info. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and now can't use Geolocation or even manual input cities location. So now u have a weather app that can't give me weather info. FIX IT!!!!
title: Broken!!

author: Dacia V
comment: I'd really like to have the options to personalize the widgets more. The options the now just aren't enough. There needs to be much more selection for the font/clock colors & for the background choices. Such as a tinted frosty clear back, etc. Besides that, I like it ♡
title: Pretty good.

author: Nathaniel Graham
comment: I've used this app for long time now, it's been my home screen widget for my last 3 phones. The widget looks fantastic, however the app is slow to update and I've never been able to get the radar view to work at all. I just get a satellite image of the landscape with no weather information, please fix this! Note 4 on T-Mobile (4.4.2).  Edit: Still no fix for the radar? It's been broken for over a year! Come on guys!

author: Joe Landry
comment: I found this app per happenstance. And its the most beautiful weather app I have ever used. The camera feature is also amazing, and innovative.
title: Beautiful

author: Lee Jones
comment: Full screen, screaming audio (even when phone set to vibrate) ads. Unacceptable and terrible UX.
title: Those ads!

author: Carlos G.
comment: I have the paid version. It loads slowly. Swiping from the first page is not fluid and takes a few tries. Galaxy S6.
title: Buggy. Paid version.

author: Bryce
comment: Little bit hard to see where you are. The second page is much better.
title: Don't get the time on the first page

author: Roy Firmansyah
comment: But there is no showing date for the widget,  it will perfect with that. Thanks
title: Very nice

author: Charles Rosaaen
comment: Widget no longer seems to be updating regularly. If I do not interact with the app it can become several days behind. Have to manually force a refresh to get new info. App is nearly 2 years past it's last update.

author: Glenn Ferguson
comment: I've had this app for years but it's been totally ruined by irrelevant, gaudy,  full screen adds after the last update. Uninstalling today.
title: Totally ruined

author: Louis Johnson
comment: I recently installed bright weather after having beautiful widget for years.  It has everything that I need with one minor feature missing... the calendar date in the clock widget.
title: Almost perfect, still worth 5 starts

author: Derick Peterson
comment: Had a frost alert option which is the main reason I got it (for gardening etc). And it works great, letting you know in advance if the temp will get near freezing in the next few days.

author: Ed Fuller
comment: 99.9% accurate no crashes widget always updates every hour and the auto locate is spot on.
title: Nexus 6

author: Craig Jackson
comment: I really like this app... Been using it for a while. Love the widget and options...   Had to clear cache and app data to get the weather to update again.

author: Luis Martinez
comment: All the information you need, in an elegantly presented application, backed by The Weather Underground. Tapping relevant portions of the screen will load the Weather Underground details driving the page. Fantastic app.
title: Simple, Beautiful, Accurate Weather Information

author: Laurens van Leeuwen
comment: Nice app, but sadly ruined by auto playing adds with video and sound.
title: Good app ruined with adds

author: Steve Oliver
comment: Not cool to crash my watch
title: Made my watch crash

author: Ivan Stoyanov
comment: Tried many weather apps, this is the one  I've settled on, sleek, efficient and well presented. The fact that it interfaces with wunderground is an extra bonus as it is the best weather site out there.

author: Nik Nor Azman Nik Soh
comment: The most comprehensive weather forecast. Make sure you turn on your 'location'.
title: Excellent

author: Eric Sliwinski
comment: I really like this app. The widget is all I use. Update to material design and it will get 5 stars.
title: Great app.

author: Dinesh R
comment: Location not updating in widgets.. other than its good.

author: Anthony Aumiller
comment: Great app so far I've seen no problem
title: Great
